pages.text: $(li)Mud Balls can be thrown to other creatures just right clicking while you are holding them on your hand.$(br)$(li)They don't inflict damage to the creatures that they hit, but they push out away.
$(li)They can be used to craft Mud blocks in a Crafting Table, make Mud Bricks Smelting Mud Balls in a Furnace or Kiln.$(br)$(li)Ceramist will exchange your Mud Balls by Emeralds too.
